feedback.title: Provide Feedback
feedback.description: Help us improve our platform by answering the questions below.
feedback.successMessage: Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate your input.
feedback.ratingLabel: How would you rate our platform?
feedback.improvementsLabel: What improvements would you like to see?
feedback.improvementsHint: Think about things you missed while using our platform, things you'd like to see different, and anything else you can think of!
feedback.improvementsPlaceholder: Write what you'd like to see different/missing...
feedback.recommendLabel: Would you rent/lend through our platform again?

error.missingFields: It looks like not all fields have been filled in!
error.submissionFailed: Something went wrong while submitting your feedback
